import './Location.css' function Location(props: any) { function kelvin_to_celcius(k: number):number { return (Math.round(k-273.15)) } function capitalize(sentence: string):string { for(let i=0; i
{props.errorMsg}
): ( (props.data.name === "") ? (
Loading
) : (
Weather in {props.data.name}, {props.data.sys.country} As of {date.toLocaleTimeString()}
{capitalize(props.data.weather[0].description)}
{kelvin_to_celcius(props.data.main.temp)}°C
Feels like {kelvin_to_celcius(props.data.main.feels_like)}°C
High {kelvin_to_celcius(props.data.main.temp_max)}°C
Low {kelvin_to_celcius(props.data.main.temp_min)}°C
Wind {Math.round(props.data.wind.speed * 3.6)} km/h
) ) ) } export default Location;
